name: Mors Smitt Holding
overview: Mors Smitt Holding offers railway relays and related technology, industrial relay technology, and maritime bridge instrumentation solutions. It offers rolling stock that includes relays, protection relays, hall effect sensors, miniature circuit breakers, traction energy management solutions, integrated electrical solutions, speedometers and panel indicators, and door control units; signaling and infrastructure products, such as protection relays, hall effect sensors, miniature circuit breakers, safety critical relays, signaling relays, protection components, retrofit and replacement solutions, and maintenance and test equipment. The company also supplies products and services for the industrial segments, including heavy duty and general purpose relays, surge protection devices, portable test and measuring equipment for installation and appliance safety, climate control components, bridge (wing) instruments, and control (rudder) room instruments, as well as offers technical support and services, and repairing services. Mors Smitt Holding serves power generation, petro-chemical and water treatment plants, mining, shipbuilding and installation, and building automation markets. It offers its products through a network of professional, subsidiaries, distributors, and agents in France, the Netherlands, the United States, and Hong Kong. The company is based in Utrecht, the Netherlands with engineering and manufacturing locations in France, the Netherlands, and China.

acquisition.source_description: Wabtec Acquires Mors Smitt, A Manufacturer Of Electronics For Rail And Industrial Markets
